title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather dashboard using the OpenWeather API, provides a 5-day forecast. This project was part of my coursework for Week 8 of an edX course

title: Kraken tech Press site
description: As part of my 8-week internship with Octopus Energy, I had the opportunity to be develop the initial Kraken Tech Press website.

title: EdX Group Project 1
description: Book recommendation app, utilizes APIs from Google Books, Mapbox, and the New York Times. Search functionality, book recommendations, and a bookstore search feature.

title: Javascript Code Quiz
description: JavaScript timed code quiz for EdX Front-End Web Development Homework Module 6, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: README.md generator
description: README generator using Node.js to automate the README creation process. Edx homework module 11

title: Jumpy Jump
description: Created 'Jumpy Jumpy,' a game using Python and Pygame.
